item.title: About
item.description: Hello First Hi, my name is alvernod (aliases), i don’t know why i am build this website, i just wanna do something productive on the weekend and yeah this is the most random thing i’ve do i guess. Second I ‘know/do’ code since junior high school (around 2010), my first program language was html, and yeah as you tought, i just learn a very basic html code like <h1> </p> <div> <a> etc.
